remarks: Rule used to change the bound variables in an indexed union, with the substitution specified implicitly by the hypothesis.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Mar-2006.)  (Revised by Andrew Salmon, 25-Jul-2011.)
statement:
cbviun.1 $e |- F/_ y B $.
cbviun.2 $e |- F/_ x C $.
cbviun.3 $e |- ( x = y -> B = C ) $.
cbviun $p |- U_ x e. A B = U_ y e. A C $.
$d A x $.
$d A y $.
